01
Main Design Elements
design Element
Theme Image

2020 The CoE conference is a group digital transformation summit, and the main purpose of the summit will focus on the theme of "improving group digitalization level" for special sharing. The inspiration for this design draws from Microsoft's sandbox game Minecraft. The main elements are designed as stacked building blocks, meaning that enterprises continuously create, survive, integrate and transform in the process of digitalization. The conference title and main body are formed in the stacking of building blocks, which implicitly matches the meaning of digitalization.

Color Selection

In terms of color selection, the main color uses Ping An orange. The extensive use of Ping An orange echoes Ping An's brand tone. The auxiliary color uses blue, which is the complementary color of orange, to increase visual impact and create a technological feel. Another auxiliary color, white, creates a clear and definite feeling and also moderates and neutralizes the strong colors of the overall picture.

COE theme image with pixel building blocks stacked, reshaping expert services. Leading the future trend of digital transformation
